# Hash
## Install
```sh
npm i --save @darkwolf/hash
```
## Usage
```javascript
const hash = require('@darkwolf/hash')

const token = hash.createHash()
const uid = hash.createUID('Ave, Darkwolf!') // wdMJC28wvtoWBBS56Vrm
```
## Methods
### createHash(secret?)
### createUID(secret?)
### createUid(secret?)
